cafe.date

Class ISO8601DateUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • cafe.date.ISO8601DateUtils

  • public class ISO8601DateUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    ISO 8601 date utilities. Supports up to 3 digits fraction of a second.
    Version:
    1.0 03/04/2013
    Author:
    Wen Yu, yuwen_66@yahoo.com

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String format(java.util.Date date) 
      static java.lang.String format(java.util.Date date, java.lang.String format) 
      static java.lang.String formatISO8601(java.util.Date date, java.util.TimeZone timeZone)
      Formats a DateTime to a ISO8601 string with a second fraction part of up to 3 digits.
      static DateTime parse(java.lang.String input)
      Parses a ISO8601 string into a DateTime to retain time zone information.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • formatISO8601

        public static java.lang.String formatISO8601(java.util.Date date,
                             java.util.TimeZone timeZone)
        Formats a DateTime to a ISO8601 string with a second fraction part of up to 3 digits.

      • parse

        public static DateTime parse(java.lang.String input)
                      throws java.text.ParseException
        Parses a ISO8601 string into a DateTime to retain time zone information. The pattern is dynamically created in accordance with the input date string. Time zone is optional. The fraction part of the second if exists is cut down to 3 digits, i.e to the precision of millisecond.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException

      • format

        public static java.lang.String format(java.util.Date date,
                      java.lang.String format)

      • format

        public static java.lang.String format(java.util.Date date)
